discussion.p: The WP and TR1 have the same text regarding the argument types of a result_of expression:

blockquote.p: The values ti are lvalues when the corresponding type Ti is a reference type, and rvalues otherwise.

discussion.p: I read this to mean that this compiles:
Should the text be updated to say "when Ti is an lvalue-reference type" or am I missing something?
I later came up with this self-contained example which won't compile, but I think it should:

blockquote.p: ... The values ti are lvalues when the corresponding type Ti is an lvalue-reference type, and rvalues otherwise.
